jerklib.tasks

Class OnceUntilSucceedsTaskImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • jerklib.tasks.TaskImpl
      • jerklib.tasks.OnceUntilSucceedsTaskImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRCEventListener, Task

    public abstract class OnceUntilSucceedsTaskImpl
extends TaskImpl
    An augmented TaskImpl that only executes once as it cancels itself out of the task queue once completed, until it succeeds (if it bails out with a RuntimeException or returns false, it will remain in the task queue.
    Author:
    pbleser
    See Also:
    OnceTaskImpl, Session.onEvent(Task), Session.onEvent(jerklib.tasks.Task, jerklib.events.IRCEvent.Type...), TaskImpl, IRCEvent.Type

    • Method Detail

      • receiveEventOnce

        public abstract boolean receiveEventOnce(IRCEvent e)
        Process the IRCEvent.
        Parameters:
        e - the IRCEvent to process
        Returns:
        whether the task was successful or not; when returning false, the task will remain in the task queue; when returning true, it will be removed (and not executed any more)
